suite.name: InfobeansAutomationScript

test.name: Validate the ServiceNow Page Load and Text of Main and Sub Heading on Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go to Landing Page of Beta
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click on Cookies Button on Main Page
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click on ServiceNow Link in Main Menu
Click on ServiceNow on Main Menu
Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Validation of Main Heading of ServiceNow Page
Validate Main Heading of Servcice_Now Page
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Validation of Sub Heading of ServiceNow Page
Validate Sub Heading of Service_Now Page
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${Sub_Heading} = Build cost-effective future workflows with us

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Get Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Gets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: This test-case verify the Page load with Main and Sub Heading of Service Now page
